entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:40 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -8.4°C
entry.summary:

Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -8.4°C

Visibility: 16.1 km

Dewpoint: -10.3°C

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
